title: (Traded) T206 Sweet Caporal 150 Kaiser Wilhelm Hands at Chest SGC 20
author: argpdt

posts.post_title: (Traded) T206 Sweet Caporal 150 Kaiser Wilhelm Hands at Chest SGC 20
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade my duplicate T206 Sweet Caporal 150 Kaiser Wilhelm Hands at Chest SGC 20 for any other T206 that I don't have (in similar condition).  My monster number is 77, so there are 100's of T206 cards that I don't have.

If someone would prefer to buy the card, it is available for $30, including shipping with tracking.

Please PM me if you are interested in the card.

Thanks, Andrew
